# The Battle Royal

| runtime        =
| country        = United States
| language       = Silent filmEnglish intertitles
}}
The Battle Royal is a 1916 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy.
Cast
* Oliver Hardy as Plump (as Babe Hardy)
* Billy Ruge as Runt
* Elsie MacLeod as Runt's sister
* Billy Bletcher as Grandpa Runt
* Will Louis as Revenue Officer
See also
* List of American films of 1916
* Oliver Hardy filmography
